definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: PEOPLE , its original authors or licensors.
sentences.chinese: 原作者或其许可方所有。

sentences.english: The originals belong to the illustrators themselves.
His painting is an exact copy of the original.
sentences.chinese: 他的画是与原作丝毫不差的临摹作品。

sentences.english: Pu Song Ling, the original author of Liao Zhai, died three centuries ago.
sentences.chinese: 聊斋的原作者蒲松龄死于三个世纪以前。

sentences.english: Follow web photos come from original oil painting, all of photos could be set orders, welcome.
sentences.chinese: 所有图片均为原作拍摄，可下订单，欢迎选购。

sentences.english: The original writer of the book is Jinyong.
sentences.chinese: 这本书的原作者是金庸。

sentences.english: This is a mark that discriminates the original from the copy.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个使原作与复制品有区别的标志。

sentences.english: You must acknowledge the original author using the correct citation and reference.
sentences.chinese: 你必须用正确的引用和参考方式注明原作者。

sentences.english: Gordon's painting was an almost perfect facsimile of the original.
sentences.chinese: 戈登的绘画简直像是原作的翻版。

sentences.english: Follow photos are taken from original work, could be set order too.
sentences.chinese: 以下照片均为原作拍摄，均可下定单。

sentences.english: Quoteing all the music is just for fun, I mean no malicious and thanks to original author.
sentences.chinese: 引用各音乐纯粹蛋疼恶搞无恶意感谢各原作者。

sentences.english: This is the original painting, and these others are copies.
sentences.chinese: 这画是原作，其他的是复制品。

sentences.english: She acquired an original painting by van gogh.
sentences.chinese: 她得到了凡高的一幅原作。

sentences.english: Photographs For Exhibition Only. To be returned to sender, No Commercial Value.
sentences.chinese: 国际摄影展览之照片，展毕退还原作者，无商业价值。

sentences.english: There are other arguments I might adduce to vindicate Shakespeare's authorship.
sentences.chinese: 我还可以引用其他论据证明莎士比亚为原作者。

sentences.english: This was not due to a lack of outstanding works for Lin to translate;
sentences.chinese: 这并非因为后期林译里缺乏出色的原作。

definition: to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
cartoons and comics/animes and mangas/cartoon (animated movie)/anime
serialized/published as a serial (in a newspaper)
to make a copy/to reproduce/to remake (a movie)
